title: Profit.co
description: Profit.co is an enterprise SaaS application with the mission to help teams and companies execute their goals using our SaaS application and coaching support. We have designed a unique execution framework called "Iterate Faster" to help businesses achieve their goals. The "Iterate Faster" methodology enables businesses to become agile execution machines. This framework uniquely combines Strategy, OKRs, Task Management, Employee Engagement and Employee development to provide a platform for executing business priorities iteratively, in a quarterly cycle. The Profit.co platform includes 400+ predefined KPIs and allows users to create their own KPIs.
